body_html: @fchollet Maybe it's some users who want to use a 3D convolutions of Slim, especially in the medical field, since in medical field we need to process a series of CT slices which are organized in a 3D volume. Of course, this is from my own using experience. But I don't think this is a niche needs. So please rethink it.
